title: Fable Has Been Delayed to 2026 - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.25.25
description:
Go to https://kindafunny.com/chicago to grab your tickets!

off your first month.

Fable has been delayed to 2026, James Gunn confirms he’s talking to Rocksteady and Netherrealm, and even more updates on Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3+4.

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
GAMESCAST - Me and Andy talking about the best PC games of all time
The STREAM is Cine2nerdle w/ Nick, Joey, and Rog
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
You can get today’s Gregway
And you can get the February Happy Hour this afternoon, and tomorrow on YouTube and Podcast services.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Delaney Twining, Karl Jacobs, OmegaBuster, & Karin Lindner

The Roper Report   -

00:42:30 - We have more teases of Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater
00:48:38 - Silent Hill 2 Remake Dev Working With Konami Again On A Mystery Game - Eddie Makuch @ Gamespot
00:53:43 - Quantic Dream says it’s ‘unaffected’ by NetEase layoffs and studio closures - Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:57:50 - Breaking News:Warner Bros. Games is shutting down Monolith Productions, Player First Games, and WB San Diego, sources tell Bloomberg News.
00:58:50 - Wee News!
